metadata.name: Potential File Overwrite Via Sysinternals SDelete
metadata.comment: Detects the use of SDelete to erase a file not the free space

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('sdelete.exe') AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -h')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -z')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /?'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of SDelete to erase a file not the free space

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ComputerName, actor.user.name, process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1485/T1485.md
